ComicInfo.Summary:
A little sibling rivalry, a lot of narcotics, a fast car on wet blacktop...and Story is spinning out of control and into a Texas jail, leaving Jenny and Martin MIA. In New Mexico, Ruth has her own trouble staying on the road and calls on old flame Carlos for help. While deep in the Colorado mountains, Sonny is missing Rosa and discovering that, when you are a Johnson, danger and weirdness come with the territory.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/outlaw-nation-6-two-more-dead-in-texas/4000-51832/
ComicInfo.Tags: Story Johnson,Kid Gloves,Rosa Cao Tri-McGee,Jenny Reiner,Sweetcakes,Sonny Johnson,Bad Bob Johnson,Martin Reiner,George Johnson
ComicInfo.Title: Two More Dead in Texas
